old:
やあ、君も探索かね？
この辺りはなかなか興味深いと思わないか
column2: Hey, are you also exploring? Don't you find this area quite interesting?
speaker: Marquis

old:
私は人を試すのが趣味でね――
いやいや、悪くとらないでくれたまえ
column2: I enjoy testing people— No, no, no, don't take this the wrong way.
speaker: Marquis

old:
単に人に興味があるだけだよ
ある者が何を目指し、何を思い、何を成すかね
column2:
I'm simply interested in people.
What some aspire to, what some think, what some accomplish.
speaker: Marquis

old:
君は、なかなか腕に自信がありそうだ
――時に思うことはないかな？
column2: You seem to have confidence in your skills. Do you ever wonder about it?
speaker: Marquis

old: 己の力量は、真にどれほどのものか――とね
column2: How much are your abilities really worth?
speaker: Marquis

column2: Oh, do you need something from me?
speaker: Marquis
